description: Minor repairs to the wharf at Margaree Harbour, structure 402. All plant, labour, equipment and materials will be supplied to accomplish this work.
full_summary:
**Wharf Repairs to Structure 402 at Margaree Harbour, Inverness County, Nova Scotia**

**Notice ID:** PW-22-01005249
**Contracting Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
**Location:** Inverness County, Nova Scotia

### Tender Details
* **Publication Date:** August 24, 2022
* **Tender Closes:** September 8, 2022 at 13:00:00 (local time)
* **Contract Type:** CNST (Construction)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **-trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contractor Eligibility
To submit a tender, contractors must be registered on the Supplier Registration System and have a valid National Industrial Security Program Operating Manual (NISPM) certification.

### Project Overview

Fisheries and Oceans Canada intends to award a contract for the repairs of marginal wharf 402 at Margaree Harbour, Inverness County, Nova Scotia. The scope of work involves the furnishing of plant, labour, equipment, and materials to carry out the repairs of marginal wharf 402.

### Tender Documents
Questions and clarifications regarding the submission process and tender documents should be directed to:

Kimberly Walker, Procurement Supervisor
Fisheries and Oceans Canada
301 Bishop Drive
Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6

Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Phone: No phone number provided

As this notice has been expired, please note that the tender closing deadline has passed. Bids for this contract are no longer being accepted.

You can download the following documents:

* [Margaree Harbour Wharf Repair Specification](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/c2-00531_margaree_specification_en.pdf) (English)
* [Margaree Harbour Wharf Repair Specification](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/c2-00531_margaree_specification_fr.pdf) (French)
* [Margaree Harbour Wharf Repairs Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/30003303_-_ITT_-_wharf_rep
